page.title: 15A day in the life
page.content: Friday by Janine Head I wake up at 6.30 a.m. and read until 7.30 a.m. Then I have breakfast and get dressed at 8.00 a.m. Before I leave for school I pack all the things I will need i.e. P.E. kit.Then I walk with my sister to school at 8.40 a.m. The whistle for school goes at 8.55 a.m. Our teacher takes the register and we go down to assembly. Then we go back to class for mathematics until 10.35 a.m.Next we have English until 11.30, then French until 12.00, when it is lunch time. Lunch is in two sittings. It ends at 1.20 p.m. We have games after lunch until 2.30 p.m. then drama or music. At 3.30 p.m. we go home. At home I do my homework and go to bed at 9.30.
